const common_1 = require("@nestjs/common");
const prisma_service_1 = require("../prisma/prisma.service");
const ops_alert_monitor_service_1 = require("../../modules/alerts/ops-alert-monitor.service");

const ignore_error_util_1 = require("../../shared/logging/ignore-error.util");
let HealthController = class HealthController {
    prisma;
    monitor;
    config;
    constructor(prisma, monitor, config) {
        this.prisma = prisma;
        this.monitor = monitor;
        this.config = config;
    }
    async checkDatabase() {
        let dbOk = false;
        try {
            await this.prisma.$queryRaw `SELECT 1`;
            dbOk = true;
        }
        catch (err) {
            (0, ignore_error_util_1.logIgnoredError)(err, 'HealthController db ping', undefined, 'debug');
        }
        let migrationsOk = true;
        Iif (dbOk) {
            try {
                await this.prisma.$queryRawUnsafe('SELECT COUNT(*)::int as c FROM _prisma_migrations WHERE applied_steps_count > 0');
            }
            catch (err) {
                (0, ignore_error_util_1.logIgnoredError)(err, 'HealthController migrations check', undefined, 'debug');
                migrationsOk = false;
            }
        }
        return { dbOk, migrationsOk };
    }
    async health(res) {
        const now = new Date().toISOString();
        try {
            await this.prisma.$queryRaw `SELECT 1`;
            res.status(200);
            return {
                ok: true,
                ts: now,
            };
        }
        catch (err) {
            (0, ignore_error_util_1.logIgnoredError)(err, 'HealthController healthz', undefined, 'debug');
            res.status(503);
            return {
                ok: false,
                ts: now,
            };
        }
    }
    async ready(res) {
        const now = new Date().toISOString();
        const { dbOk, migrationsOk } = await this.checkDatabase();
        const ready = dbOk && migrationsOk;
        res.status(ready ? 200 : 503);
        return {
            ready,
            ts: now,
            checks: {
                database: dbOk,
                migrations: migrationsOk,
            },
        };
    }
    async opsReady(res) {
        const now = new Date().toISOString();
        const { dbOk, migrationsOk } = await this.checkDatabase();
        const pendingThreshold = Math.max(0, this.config.getNumber('ALERT_OUTBOX_PENDING_THRESHOLD', 100) ?? 100);
        const deadThreshold = Math.max(0, this.config.getNumber('ALERT_OUTBOX_DEAD_THRESHOLD', 5) ?? 5);
        let workersOk = true;
        let workersExpected = 0;
        let workersStale = 0;
        let outboxOk = true;
        let outboxPending = 0;
        let outboxDead = 0;
        let workers = [];
        try {
            const snapshot = await this.monitor.snapshot();
            workers = snapshot.workers;
            const expected = workers.filter((w) => w.expected);
            workersExpected = expected.length;
            workersStale = expected.filter((w) => w.stale).length;
            workersOk = workersStale === 0;
            outboxPending = snapshot.metrics.outboxPending;
            outboxDead = snapshot.metrics.outboxDead;
            outboxOk =
                (pendingThreshold <= 0 || outboxPending <= pendingThreshold) &&
                    (deadThreshold <= 0 || outboxDead <= deadThreshold);
        }
        catch (err) {
            (0, ignore_error_util_1.logIgnoredError)(err, 'HealthController snapshot', undefined, 'debug');
            workersOk = false;
            outboxOk = false;
        }
        const ready = dbOk && migrationsOk && workersOk && outboxOk;
        res.status(ready ? 200 : 503);
        return {
            ready,
            ts: now,
            checks: {
                database: dbOk,
                migrations: migrationsOk,
                workers: {
                    ok: workersOk,
                    expected: workersExpected,
                    stale: workersStale,
                },
                outbox: {
                    ok: outboxOk,
                    pending: outboxPending,
                    dead: outboxDead,
                    pendingThreshold,
                    deadThreshold,
                },
            },
            workers,
        };
    }
};
exports.HealthController = HealthController;
